stories.description: Scripts
Scripts
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure a currency that allows for accumulated spend. This has been coded buy not tested.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to specify the name of the voucher type that is generated whenever a member reaches the voucher generation threshold for a currency.
Done (as part of Authsome; UI available)
As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for specific products (and members) and send them to TXN.  I want to see raw response.
Add a link to the currency balance in the POST TXN response. Align with API design.
As a Tenant Application I want to provide a transaction which contains tagged products with dollar values, and accumulate the dollar values against any appropriate current balance.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want to be advised of vouchers available to the member.
As a Tenant Application I want to use a voucher available to a member.
As a Tenant Application I want to create a voucher for a particular currency
As a Tenant Application I want to get a member's currency balances.
As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for an accumulated product(s).
As a Tenant Application I want any vouchers associated with the cancel transaction to be removed.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able considered to be opted in to my programme for POS purposes when they complete registration
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be required to verify their email address
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to decrease the threshold at which a reward voucher is generated for a particular currency.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to increase the threshold at which a reward voucher is generated for a particular currency.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to complete registration online by selecting a postal address using AddressFinder
As a Member I want to be able to log in to the customer portal
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they complete registration or log in, to be able to view their personal and contact details
As a Tenant Application I want to determine how far a member is from earning a voucher for each currency.
As a Tenant Application I want to cancel the "current" transaction.  Previous transactions can not be cancelled.
Configure LiabPortal for deployment to cloud_staging
Add location information to a create voucher and the fulfillment.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify their member identifier and initiate registration
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to complete registration online by specifying their personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to get all available vouchers.
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I also want to get all vouchers that have been earned but are not available without another transaction
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify their member identifier and initiate registration
Move existing API documentation from Wiki to Gollum
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the number of available vouchers to be determined based on the value of the voucher.
As a LNZL Developer when I'm configuring a reward for a currency I want to be able to specify the value of that reward in terms of the currency it is associated with.
As a Member, when I log in I want to be advised what I can use to identify myself when I log in
Vouchers to use the timestamps structure as per Transactions.
Configure Sendmail on staging
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to see my recent transactions.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to see my currency balances
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure the number of transactions to be displayed on the Tenant's customer portal.
Implement a Timeline service that provides a time-based list of activities for the account.
As a Member I want to be able to request my password be reset when I have forgotten it.
As a LNZ developer responsible for running scripts to set up a LIAB Tenant I want to have somewhere to store the email address from which automated administration emails should appear to be sent

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

As a LNZL Developer when I'm configuring a reward for a currency I want to be able to specify the value of that reward in terms of the currency it is associated with.
As a Member, when I log in I want to be advised what I can use to identify myself when I log in
Vouchers to use the timestamps structure as per Transactions.
Configure Sendmail on staging
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to see my recent transactions.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to see my currency balances
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure the number of transactions to be displayed on the Tenant's customer portal.
Implement a Timeline service that provides a time-based list of activities for the account.

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

Scripts
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure a currency that allows for accumulated spend. This has been coded buy not tested.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to specify the name of the voucher type that is generated whenever a member reaches the voucher generation threshold for a currency.
Done (as part of Authsome; UI available)
As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for specific products (and members) and send them to TXN.  I want to see raw response.
Add a link to the currency balance in the POST TXN response. Align with API design.
As a Tenant Application I want to provide a transaction which contains tagged products with dollar values, and accumulate the dollar values against any appropriate current balance.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want to be advised of vouchers available to the member.
As a Tenant Application I want to use a voucher available to a member.

As a Tenant Application I want to get a member's currency balances.
As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for an accumulated product(s).
As a Tenant Application I want any vouchers associated with the cancel transaction to be removed.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able considered to be opted in to my programme for POS purposes when they complete registration
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be required to verify their email address
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to decrease the threshold at which a reward voucher is generated for a particular currency.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to increase the threshold at which a reward voucher is generated for a particular currency.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to complete registration online by selecting a postal address using AddressFinder
As a Member I want to be able to log in to the customer portal
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they complete registration or log in, to be able to view their personal and contact details

As a Tenant Application I want to cancel the "current" transaction.  Previous transactions can not be cancelled.

Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.
Scripts.
Scripts
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure a currency that allows for accumulated spend. This has been coded buy not tested.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to specify the name of the voucher type that is generated whenever a member reaches the voucher generation threshold for a currency.
Done (as part of Authsome; UI available)
As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for specific products (and members) and send them to TXN.  I want to see raw response.
Add a link to the currency balance in the POST TXN response. Align with API design.
As a Tenant Application I want to provide a transaction which contains tagged products with dollar values, and accumulate the dollar values against any appropriate current balance.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want to be advised of vouchers available to the member.
As a Tenant Application I want to use a voucher available to a member.
As a Tenant Application I want to create a voucher for a particular currency
As a Tenant Application I want to get a member's currency balances.
As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for an accumulated product(s).
As a Tenant Application I want any vouchers associated with the cancel transaction to be removed.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able considered to be opted in to my programme for POS purposes when they complete registration
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be required to verify their email address
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to decrease the threshold at which a reward voucher is generated for a particular currency.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to increase the threshold at which a reward voucher is generated for a particular currency.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to complete registration online by selecting a postal address using AddressFinder
As a Member I want to be able to log in to the customer portal
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they complete registration or log in, to be able to view their personal and contact details
As a Tenant Application I want to determine how far a member is from earning a voucher for each currency.
As a Tenant Application I want to cancel the "current" transaction.  Previous transactions can not be cancelled.
Configure LiabPortal for deployment to cloud_staging
Add location information to a create voucher and the fulfillment.
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify their member identifier and initiate registration
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to complete registration online by specifying their personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to get all available vouchers.
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I also want to get all vouchers that have been earned but are not available without another transaction
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify their member identifier and initiate registration
Move existing API documentation from Wiki to Gollum
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the number of available vouchers to be determined based on the value of the voucher.
As a LNZL Developer when I'm configuring a reward for a currency I want to be able to specify the value of that reward in terms of the currency it is associated with.
As a Member, when I log in I want to be advised what I can use to identify myself when I log in
Vouchers to use the timestamps structure as per Transactions.
Configure Sendmail on staging

As a Member logged into the portal I want to see my currency balances
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure the number of transactions to be displayed on the Tenant's customer portal.
Implement a Timeline service that provides a time-based list of activities for the account.
As a Member I want to be able to request my password be reset when I have forgotten it.

As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.

Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for specific products (and members) and send them to TXN.  I want to see raw response.

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.
Provide a transaction balances API on TXN for Tenants that don't have our Member Services (but are providing account numbers on transaction creations).
Provide a TXN vouchers API.
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my username
As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

As a Member logged into the portal I want to be able to change my password
As a LIAB Tenant I want my customers, when they register, to have the correct validation applied to their data.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure a Tenant as offering one or more currency "stamps" for a member completing the registration process.
As a Member I want to update my personal details and comms preferences
As a Tenant Application I want to determine the member's registration status
As a Tenant Application I want to receive an appropriate error message when I attempt to fulfill a voucher with a value > 0 without first posting a transaction.
As a logged in member when I open a footer link I want it to open in a new window
As a LNZL developer I want to be able to specify footer links for the customer portal
As a Tenant Application when I get all available vouchers I want to be advised of the value of each of those vouchers
As a Tenant Application when I create a voucher for a particular currency I want that voucher to have the value of the current voucher value setting.
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction, I want the value of created vouchers to be retained with the voucher in case the default voucher value subsequently changes.
As a LNZL Developer I want to configure that a Tenant will provide a specific currency reward (voucher) to a member when they complete registration.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more currency stamps set up as a registration reward I want to have those stamps added to my balance.
As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

Scripts
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to configure a currency that allows for accumulated spend. This has been coded buy not tested.
As a LNZL Developer I want to be able to specify the name of the voucher type that is generated whenever a member reaches the voucher generation threshold for a currency.

As a Tester I want to be able to create a TXN for specific products (and members) and send them to TXN.  I want to see raw response.

Add a Tenant configuration check to TXN to determine whether the tenant has Member Services.  If so, TXN it should check with member services for account information (this is to remove the "IF FLYBUYS then" switch, and make it a little more generic.
Modify the Transaction Creation service to check with Member services to find an account for the passed-in token (the general FB behaviour), and that if the account doesn't exist, then create it.
Support the CoCo Multi-token model in Member Services.
Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
Implement a balances API on TXN that allows the tenant to pass in multiple token_ids, to enable a tenant that that does not use our member services but supports multiple tokens per "account.

As a Tenant I want registering members to me able to select the title 'Miss' and to not see redundant error messages.
As a Tenant Application when I use a voucher available to a member I want the member's balance for the associated currency to be reduced by the value of the voucher.
As a Member when I register if there are one or more vouchers set up as a registration reward I want to have those vouchers made available to me.
As a Tenant I want registering members to only be able to find postal addresses, enter 4 digit postcodes and not have to enter 4 address lines.
As a Tenant I want my customers to be able to specify a non-physical address if they choose to enter an address manually
As a Tenant I want my customers to have to verify their email address before they complete verification
As a Tenant Application when I post a transaction that does not increment a currency I want that balance to not be incremented at all, ie. not have 0 added to the balance.
As a Tenant Application if I fulfill a voucher that has a value of 0 I do not want 0 to be subtracted from the member's associated currency balance.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with a member's currency balances the balances and the amounts below threshold are both displayed as big decimals
As a Member logged into the portal I want to view the reward vouchers I  have available for fulfillment.
As a Member logged into the portal when I am viewing my available vouchers I want to see the icon associated with the currency of each voucher.
As a Tenant Application when I am provided with all available vouchers I want expired vouchers to be excluded.

Channel all /accounts/ URLs through Member Services, and have them call the necessary internal TXN services where necessary.
